Asheville.Asheville Police Department:
The Asheville Police Department (APD) is a nationally accredited police department and the primary law enforcement agency servicing a population of 72,789 people within 40.0 square miles (100 km2) of the municipality of Asheville, North Carolina.


== History ==
The Asheville Police Department was created in 1849 with a volunteer force of 5 officers and a captain. Because they were not authorized to carry weapons at the time, the volunteers had to weigh no less than 190 pounds (86 kg).
